Item.comments: update header_item_type data to "Document Book" - SQL
Item.method_code:
' Use Run Method action
' Data Administration tool Dim SQLstr As String = "" Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim res As Item
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
SQLstr = SQLstr & " UPDATE [DOCUMENT_SECTION] Set [DOCUMENT_SECTION].header_item_type='Document Book' WHERE [DOCUMENT_SECTION].header_item_type='Document Collection'" res = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
Return inn.newResult("DONE")
Item.name: SYS_DocuHierarchy AdminHelper01
